upload.form.groupingCheckbox_label: Are your samples in groups, pairs or replicates?
upload.form.altServiceId_label: I don't have an iLabs Service ID
upload.form.altServiceId_helptext: The iLabs service ID is found on the top of the iLabs submission. Please submit iLabs if you haven't done so. For now, a placeholder will be used. Please write down this number to link this submission to your request (once sample information has been submitted, the placeholder will also be available on the receipt.
upload.form.serviceId_helptext: Enter your six digit iLabs Service ID
upload.form.patientIdTypeSpecified_helptext: MRN, DMP-ID (P-0000000-A00-ABC) or CMO-ID (C-A1B2C3 or C-A1B2C3)
upload.form.groupIdType_helptext: Select Patient or Group ID Type
upload.form.isShared_label: I want others to be able to edit or submit these samples on my behalf.
upload.form.sharedWith_helptext:
Please enter MSK email addresses or zzPDLs separated by comma.
 No emails will be sent, this is only used for authorization.
